long_term.title: Telegram’s Pavel Durov Is Using Bitcoin to Bypass Russian Sanctions
long_term.summary: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov is reportedly using Bitcoin to bypass Russian sanctions. long_term.title: Cryptocurrency: Bitcoin is Dropping After Google’s Major Decision
long_term.summary: Google announced it would block all advertisements related to cryptocurrencies and ICOs. This decision, following Facebook's similar ban, signals a growing trend of major tech platforms restricting crypto advertising. While this may cause short-term price dips, it also pushes the industry towards more organic growth and potentially more legitimate advertising channels in the long run, reducing reliance on speculative ad campaigns.
long_term.rationale: Google's decision to ban crypto ads, mirroring Facebook's move, represents a significant shift in online advertising for the crypto space. While it may lead to short-term price pressure, it could foster more sustainable, non-speculative growth and adoption in the long term.

long_term.rationale: Salesforce's entry into blockchain development signifies a major enterprise adoption trend. This integration by a leading software company can legitimize blockchain technology and potentially drive demand for related crypto assets and infrastructure.

It signals increased institutional involvement in the mining sector and promises to drive competition and innovation in hardware, potentially boosting mining efficiency and network capacity.
